medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had been well until approximately 1 month before admission when he developed fatigue, fever, pharyngitis, and lymphadenopathy. Two weeks before admission, dysphagia and right ear pain with decreased hearing occurred. Severe otalgia developed 8 days prior to admission, and he noted clumsiness with movements and increasing gait imbalance the night before admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of acne, asthma, and childhood otitis media; underwent inguinal herniorrhaphy as an infant.
medical_history.family_history: Paternal grandfather had polymyalgia rheumatica and a stroke; no other family history of neurologic or rheumatologic diseases.
medical_history.social_history: Attended college; did not smoke, drink alcohol, or use illicit drugs.
